input_text:
Job Title: Transportation Coordinator

Location: Elizabeth, NJ

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
We Deliver the Goods: Tuesday-Saturday 7:00am-3:30pm

Competitive pay and benefits, including Day 1 Health & Wellness Benefits, Employee Stock Purchase Plan, 401K Employer Matching, Education Assistance, Paid Time Off, and much moreGrowth opportunities performing essential work to support America’s food distribution systemSafe and inclusive working environment, including culture of rewards, recognition, and respect

Position Purpose: 

Food and food service delivery Drivers fulfill a critical role in the country’s food supply chain. Our delivery drivers not only make sure the customers’ products arrive at their destination at the arranged times and in good condition, but they are the face of our company – building lasting relationships with our customers!

As a Coordinator, Transportation, you will play a vital role in ensuring our drivers is equipped with the information needed to deliver all products on time and safely. The Coordinator, Transportation supports the transportation team in improving production processes and maintaining daily business. This includes tracking, calculating, and coordinating a variety of driver and route information along with performing administrative tasks. Communicates and interacts with customers, vendors and co-workers professionally ensuring questions are answered accurately and in a timely manner. Functions as a team member within the department and organization, as required, and perform any duty assigned to best serve the company.

Responsibilities may include, but not limited to:

Tracks, calculates, and coordinates driver and route information. Performs driver check-in. Answers and coordinates incoming transportation related phone calls. Maintains and tracks all DOT required files and other reports (vehicle inspection, fuel, and mileage). Tracks, inputs, and processes driver payroll data. Performs other related duties as assigned. 

QualificationsHigh School Diploma/GED Or Equivalent

6-12 months in a transportation environment

Administrative support performing basic math and computer data entry skills Knowledge and understanding of Department of Transportation regulations.

Pass post offer drug test and criminal background check.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level

output_json.title: Transportation Coordinator
output_json.summary: Essential role in food distribution system, supporting drivers and ensuring timely deliveries.
job_responsibilities: Tracks, calculates, and coordinates driver and route information.
Answers and coordinates incoming transportation related phone calls.
Maintains and tracks all DOT required files and other reports.
Tracks, inputs, and processes driver payroll data.
output_json.company_information: Competitive pay and benefits, including growth opportunities, safe and inclusive working environment.
output_json.equal_opportunity_policy: Culture of rewards, recognition, and respect.

other.content: High School Diploma/GED Or Equivalent, Knowledge and understanding of Department of Transportation regulations.
